header.title: How we created a brand and SaaS platform to help manage sports facilities.
header.subtitle: FitWise

overview.description: FitWise is a modern web application designed specifically for owners of sports facilities and personal trainers. With its advanced features, FitWise enables efficient management of sports facilities, class schedules, user registration, and collaboration with trainers. This comprehensive tool simplifies work organization, saves time, and supports business growth, all while offering an intuitive interface and ease of use. Choose FitWise to streamline the operations of your sports facility and focus on what matters most building relationships with clients and fostering their passion for physical activity.

challenges.title: Complex User Requirements
challenges.description: Developing a platform that caters to both beginners and advanced fitness enthusiasts while maintaining simplicity and usability.

challenges.title: Difficult To Organise
challenges.description: When a business is scaled, there is the problem of chaos in booking a calendar. In the fitness industry, you always need to have a quick overview of the day's activities.

challenges.title: List of class participants
challenges.description: Often personal trainers get lost in the list of their subjects they train with at the gym. It is necessary to create an easing of this problem.

solutions.title: User-Centric Design
solutions.description: We have implemented an intuitive interface that gives you a quick overview of what interests you most.

solutions.title: Keep your finger on the pulse
solutions.description: We've added a quick preview to the calendar so nothing ever surprises you.

solutions.title: Checklist with participants
solutions.description: Quickly check the list of people attending a class. Mark who came and who didn't. A small thing that helps so much.
